channel.title: hightlight.js on Wagnaria
channel.description: Recent content in hightlight.js on Wagnaria

item.title: Hugo Syntax Highlight by Highlight.js 設定紀錄
item.description: Step 1: 新增/layout/partials/Highlight-js.html <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.15.8/styles/vs2015.min.css" rel="stylesheet" /> <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.15.8/highlight.min.js"></script> <script> hljs.initHighlightingOnLoad(); </script> Step 2: 在header中加入 {{ partial "Highlight-js.html" }} 其中css的cdn可以換成不同風格的
